  • Method Details

    • resolve_fight

      public static boolean resolve_fight(Predator attacker, Prey defender)
      Static method used to resolve a conflict between Predator - attacker and Prey - defender. This method calculates the difference in strength between the two animals and decreases health of the defender according to that difference. If the current health of the defender falls to 0 or below, the method ends Prey's thread and returns true as a means to signal to the attacker that the hunt was successful. Otherwise, the method returns false.
      Parameters:
      attacker - (Predator)
      defender - (Prey)
      Returns:
      if hunt was successful (boolean)
